name: 2018/12/09 Dinner
description: This high-protein, low-carb dinner is perfect for those who are looking for a healthful meal option. Featuring a variety of nutritious ingredients such as abalone, carrots, pork roast, baked salmon steak, broccoli, cabbage, capsicum green, and flavored with roasted sesame dressing, thyme, and rosemary, it's a healthy recipe that doesn't skimp on taste or satisfaction.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your ingredients: slice the carrots, cut the abalone, broccoli, red cabbage, raw cabbage, and capsicum green into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the pork roast in a preheated oven at 350째F (175째C) for about 60 minutes or until fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: While the pork is roasting, bake the salmon steak in the oven at 350째F (175째C) for 20 to 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the sliced carrots, broccoli, red and raw cabbage, and capsicum green until tender, approximately 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the roasted sesame dressing with thyme and rosemary.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Once everything is cooked, arrange the pork roast, baked salmon, steamed vegetables, and abalone on a plate.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the mixed roasted sesame dressing over the dish before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
